headline: Finlay Mineral's ATTY 2025 Exploration Program Delivers Expanded and Multiple New Targets
summary: Finlay Minerals Ltd. (TSXV: FYL) (OTCQB: FYMNF) ("Finlay" or the "Company") announces that the 2025 ATTY exploration program expanded known targets and identified further new copper ("Cu") and gold ("Au") porphyry targets. The ATTY Project, is strategically centered within a major porphyry corridor in the Toodoggone district and is under an Earn-In Agreement with Freeport-McMoRan Mineral Properties Canada Inc. ("Freeport ") (1). Refer to Figure 1 – ATTY Porphyry Corridor within the Toodoggone Di
